function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High early infection rates of COVID-19 without policies","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus with short doubling time","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective policies and interventions to control the spread","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing technology, and vaccination programs","People":"General population in the affected countries","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variability in growth rates due to multiple factors","Impact":"Difficulty in determining true epidemiological differences and identifying the sources of high estimates","Mitigation":"Improvement in data quality, thorough epidemiological analysis, and consideration of potential confounding factors","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analysis tools, and advanced testing methods","People":"Epidemiologists, data analysts, and public health researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Irregularities in pre-intervention infections data in Wuhan","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the situation and potential suppression of outbreak information","Mitigation":"Thorough investigation of data irregularities, transparency in reporting, and adherence to national standards for diagnosis and case definitions","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, transparency and reporting platforms, and surveillance systems","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists, and data analysts","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
